attributes.action: There it too much litter on the floor and in the ocean harming wildlife.
attributes.additional_details: I would also like the Government to sell bio-degradable and compostable bags in all shops and to encourage the people of the UK to use less Fossil fuel you can do this by going on bike rides more often and going on walks .
attributes.background: I would like the Government to place more bins around parks and communal areas and to use more recyclable plastics in bottles and packaging.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Councils are responsible for litter provision. You might like to sign these petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584072
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566467

Shops are responsible for deciding on the bags they sell, but you might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581139
